page.title: 14Camps and Fishing
page.content:
At playtimes at school we play in our {camp}at the top of the field. We play cowboys or children who have run away from their mother and father. We make things out of mud and other things we find. We have a food store and a well. We have a kitchen where we make food and a sitting room for playing games and going to sleep. At home I play in my own camp which is camouflaged so nobody can see it.
I like {fishing}because it is a quiet sport. I have 2 rods. The idea is that you cast out the line, with hook and bait at the end, by flicking the rod. You look at the float which is attached to the line. If the float goes under you have a bite and you reel in the fish. It is possible to sit by the water for hours and catch nothing.
